alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LAKE COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, or 18 miles east of Ely, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Anyone at a campground or in the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness should seek sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
